channel.title: Teleporting from wildy when in combat (only in Wildy)
channel.description: anyone have an idea on how to make it to where you cant teleport in the wildy when in combat, at any lvl? if you do please help thank you.

item.title: Teleporting from wildy when in combat (only in Wildy)
item.dc:creator: @arabboi arabboi
item.description:
@arabboi wrote:

i love you sir!! it worked!!thank you!!

item.title: Teleporting from wildy when in combat (only in Wildy)
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

you should have a inWild boolean (could be inWild() ) in your player class. also, there’s probably an integer in your player class called something like “underAttackBy” that will be greater than 0 if the player is under attack. so in your teleport method throw in an if statement something like this:

if (c.inWild && c.underAttackBy > 0) { c.sendMessage("you can't teleport out of the wild"); return; }

Read full topic
item.source: Teleporting from wildy when in combat (only in Wildy)
